Table.ten: select a.makp,count(*) tso,sum(to_number(decode(a.ttlucrv,1,1,0))) c01,sum(to_number(decode(a.ttlucrv,2,1,0))) c02,sum(to_number(decode(a.ttlucrv,3,1,0))) c03,sum(to_number(decode(a.ttlucrv,4,1,0))) c04,sum(to_number(decode(a.ttlucrv,5,1,0))) c05,sum(to_number(decode(a.ttlucrv,6,1,0))) c06,sum(to_number(decode(a.ttlucrv,7,1,0))) c07,sum(to_number(decode(a.ttlucrv,8,1,0))) c08,sum(to_number(decode(a.ttlucrv,9,1,0))) c09,sum(to_number(decode(a.ttlucrv,10,1,0))) c10 from his.xuatvien a,his.btdbn b,his.benhandt c where a.mabn=b.mabn and a.maql=c.maql and c.loaiba=1

select a.makp,count(*) tso,sum(to_number(decode(a.ttlucrv,1,1,0))) c01,sum(to_number(decode(a.ttlucrv,2,1,0))) c02,sum(to_number(decode(a.ttlucrv,3,1,0))) c03,sum(to_number(decode(a.ttlucrv,4,1,0))) c04,sum(to_number(decode(a.ttlucrv,5,1,0))) c05,sum(to_number(decode(a.ttlucrv,6,1,0))) c06,sum(to_number(decode(a.ttlucrv,7,1,0))) c07,sum(to_number(decode(a.ttlucrv,8,1,0))) c08,sum(to_number(decode(a.ttlucrv,9,1,0))) c09,sum(to_number(decode(a.ttlucrv,10,1,0))) c10 from his.benhanngtr a,his.btdbn b where a.mabn=b.mabn and a.ngayrv is not null
